rev.desc.rev.desc: on set.locked changed $L.fc.sql to use "IM." instead of "problem."
added processing to set $axces.bypass.failed.validation to true prior to the call to apm.save.problem
modifed exit due to changes to the paramater panel of apm.save.problem. (Had to add two new exits due to error found on IM00088 in the betat when testing SCD.)
Modified to use probsummary instead of problem.
Do not add the schedule record. Let the scheduler.process application update it. Also changed the interval added to 5 min instead of 5 hours.
Corrected typo on the locked panel. Changed expiration in $L.schedule=tod+'05:00:00' to expiration in $L.schedule=tod()+'05:00:00'.

descript.descript: on set.locked changed $L.fc.sql to use "IM." instead of "problem."
added processing to set $axces.bypass.failed.validation to true prior to the call to apm.save.problem
modifed exit due to changes to the paramater panel of apm.save.problem. (Had to add two new exits due to error found on IM00088 in the betat when testing SCD.)
Modified to use probsummary instead of problem.
Do not add the schedule record. Let the scheduler.process application update it.
Corrected typo on the locked panel. Changed expiration in $L.schedule=tod+'05:00:00' to expiration in $L.schedule=tod()+'05:00:00'.
